plot_cell_distances_violin

Source: R/plot_cell_distances_violin.R
plot_cell_distances_violin.Rd

Plots distances between cells as a violin plot

Usage

plot_cell_distances_violin(cell_to_cell_dist)

Arguments

cell_to_cell_dist

Output from calculate_all_distances_between_phenotypes

Value

A plot is returned

Examples

distances <- calculate_distances_between_cell_types(SPIAT::defined_image,
cell_types_of_interest = c("Immune1", "Immune2"), feature_colname="Cell.Type")
plot_cell_distances_violin(distances)
